author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Hardwood floor removal tips…I set the saw blade depth to 3/4 inch, which was slightly more than the hardwood thickness. I removed all the hardwood so that I could install plywood in the shower. That’s important for the new shower pan. Always be safe when doing work in older homes because they often have gas lines like this one.
